name: 千雪
text: きゃっ……！

name: 甘奈
text: 甜花ちゃんっ、いっぱい来てるよ！
trans: There's a ton coming your way, Tenka-chan!

name: 甜花
text: ──任せて
trans: ──No problem.

name: 甜花
text: ふーっ…………余裕
trans: Heh............ Not even close, baby.

name: 甘奈
text:
ひゃーっ☆
甜花ちゃん、さすが～！　かっこ良かったよー☆
trans:
Wooooo☆ You're always so good at this, Tenka-chan!
You were so cool☆

name: 千雪
text:
本当……！
すごいのね、甜花ちゃん……！
trans: Yeah...! You were pretty amazing, Tenka-chan...!

name: 千雪
text:
私、今なんにもできなかったわね
ごめんなさい
trans: I was completely useless there. Sorry.

name: 甜花
text:
ううん、千雪さん……甜花こそ……
……甜花の教え方、悪かった……？
trans:
Oh... don't worry... Chiyuki-san...... Was Tenka's
teaching style... not good enough......?

name: 千雪
text:
違うの甜花ちゃん！
ルールはちゃんとわかってたはずだったんだけど
trans:
That's not it, Tenka-chan! I think I understood
the rules in general.

name: 千雪
text: 実際に敵が出てくると、びっくりしちゃって
trans:
That's not it, Tenka-chan! I think I understood
the rules in general.

name: 甜花
text: そっか……それは、慣れが必要……
trans: Oh okay...... So then... you gotta just... get used to it...

name: 甜花
text:
……後は……
反射で、体が動くようにする……
trans:
......And then......
Your body will move...... on its own......

name: 甘奈
text: おおっ、プロみたいだよ！　甜花ちゃん！
trans: Woah, you're just like a pro, Tenka-chan!

name: 甘奈
text:
でも反射は難しいよね。千雪さん初めてだし……
もう１回説明があった方がいいんじゃないかな？
trans:
But reflexes are pretty hard to achieve. It's her
first time after all... Maybe you should re-explain it?

name: 千雪
text:
そうね
私、まだ手順を思い浮かべないと動けないもの
trans:
That would be nice. I can't really move like that if 
don't even know how to move.

name: 甜花
text:
わかった……
そしたら、おさらいしよう……
trans:
Got it......
In that case... it's review time......

name: 甜花
text:
撃つのは、簡単……
忘れちゃダメなのは、リロード……
trans:
Shooting... is the easy part......
but... you can't forget... to reload......

name: 甜花
text:
あと、狙いが……安定しなくなっちゃうから……
銃、持ったら……脇……しめるって、意識する……
trans:
Also... if your aim isn't steady...... then... make sure
to... close your armpits......

name: 千雪
text: うん。リロードと、銃の持ち方ね──……！
trans: Okay. Reloading and holding the gun──...!

name: 甜花
text:
……最後に……びっくりしても……
銃を下げない……
trans:
......Lastly...... even if you get surprised...... Don't lower
your gun......

name: 千雪
text:
びっくりしても銃を下げない……
これが１番難しそう……
trans:
Don't lower your gun, even if you get surprised...
That one seems like it'll be the hardest...

name: 甜花
text: ……いけそう……？
trans: ......Think you can do it......?

name: 千雪
text: ──大丈夫！　いけるわ、甜花ちゃん
trans: ──Yeah! I can do it,  Tenka-chan.

name: 甜花
text: ……じゃあ、次のステージ……！
trans: ......Alright... onto the next stage......!

name: 甘奈
text:
甜花ちゃんも千雪さんも頑張れー☆
甘奈、動画撮っとくからね！
trans:
Good luck you two☆
I'm gonna get a video!

name: 甜花
text: この程度……甜花の、敵じゃない……！
trans: At this rate...... You aren't even a threat to Tenka...!

name: 甘奈
text:
甜花ちゃんいいよ～！
そっちの敵、すぐいなくなっちゃいそう！
trans:
Good job Tenka-chan～! You're gonna take that
enemy out super quick!

name: 千雪
text:
わぁっ……！
や、やっぱり、始まると驚いちゃうわね……！
trans: Ah...! I-It's still so surprising at the start...!

name: 甘奈
text: 千雪さん！　右右！
trans: Chiyuki-san! Watch out, on your right!

name: 千雪
text: えっ？　あっ、こっちにもいたのね──？！
trans: Huh? Oh, there's one over here too──?!

name: 甜花
text:
まだ、距離ある……
落ち着いて……！
trans:
It's still... far away......
Stay calm......!

name: 千雪
text: ありがとう甜花ちゃん、えっと、よく狙って──
trans: Thank you Tenka-chan. Um, aim straight at it──

name: 千雪
text: ──えいっ
trans: ──There!

name: 甜花
text: ……お見事……
trans: ......Magnificent......

name: 甘奈
text:
わーっ、すごいよ千雪さん！
１発で急所に直撃だったね！
trans:
Woah, you're doing great, Chiyuki-san!
You hit that one right in its weak spot!

name: 千雪
text: ほんとう？　良かったぁ……！
trans: Oh, did I? Yay...!

name: 甜花
text: 千雪さん……リロード、忘れない……
trans: Don't forget... to reload...... Chiyuki-san......

name: 千雪
text: あっ、ごめんなさい！
trans: Oh, sorry!

name: 千雪
text: ……ふふっ
trans: ...Fufu.

name: 甘奈
text:
あっ、千雪さん！？
前来てるよっ、撃って撃って～！
trans:
Ah! Chiyuki-san!
There's one in front of you, shoot it! Shoot it!

name: 千雪
text: ええっ！？
trans: Huhhh!?

name: 甜花
text: いっぱい、遊んじゃった……
trans: We played... a ton......

name: 甘奈
text: ホントだね！　甜花ちゃんが楽しそうで良かった☆
trans: We sure did! I'm glad you had so much fun☆

name: 甜花
text: みんなで遊ぶの、楽しい……
trans: It's fun... hanging out with everyone......

name: 甘奈
text: 結構色んなゲームがあったもんね～☆
trans: There were a ton of different games～☆

name: 千雪
text: 甜花ちゃん、どれも上手ですごかったわ
trans: It was amazing how good you were at all of them.

name: 甜花
text: にへへ……そうかな……
trans: Nihehe...... you think so......?

name: 千雪
text: ええ、それに教えるのも上手！
trans: Yeah, and you're great at teaching them!

name: 千雪
text:
私、次ここに来たら、
ひとりでも全部のゲームができちゃいそうだもの
trans:
Thanks to you, now I think I could even play any of
them on my own next time I come.

name: 甜花
text:
それは……
千雪さん……コツ覚えるの、早かったから……
trans:
Well......
You seem to... remember the tricks... really easily......

name: 千雪
text:
えー？
ガンシューティングの時の私を見ても、まだそう言える？
trans:
Huh?
Can you really say that after seeing me shoot?

name: 甜花
text: にへへ……
trans: Nihehe......

name: 甘奈
text:
あ、ふたりともごめん！
甘奈、中に忘れ物してきちゃった！
trans:
Oh, sorry guys!
I think I left something in there!

name: 甘奈
text: ちょっと待ってて！
trans: Wait up just a sec!

name: 千雪
text:
あ、甘奈ちゃん、一緒に戻っても──って、
もう行っちゃった……
trans:
Oh, Amana-chan, maybe we should──
And there she goes...

name: 千雪
text: ──甜花ちゃん、ゲーム詳しいのね
trans: ──Tenka-chan, you know a lot about games, right?

name: 甜花
text:
どう……だろ……
いっぱい、やってる……だけ……
trans:
Maybe...... maybe not......
She just... plays them...... a lot......

name: 千雪
text: そう？
trans: Really?

name: 千雪
text:
でも私、今日は甜花ちゃんのエスコートがあったから、
ゲームを何倍も楽しめたんだと思うな
trans:
Well, I think I had a ton more fun today because you
were my escort.

name: 千雪
text: 今度は、また違うゲームも教えてもらっていい？
trans:
Would you be okay teaching me another game next
time?

name: 甜花
text:
うん……っ
いつでも……！
trans:
Sure......
Anytime......!

name: 甜花
text:
…………
あ、あの……この前……

name: 千雪
text: なあに？
trans: What is it?

name: 甜花
text:
ブックカフェ……で、
……なーちゃんと、何話してたの？
trans:
In the book cafe......
what did you... talk about... with Naa-chan?

name: 千雪
text: 本のお話よ
trans: We talked about books.

name: 千雪
text:
どういう本を読むのか聞いたり──
甘奈ちゃんに、おすすめしてもらったりとか
trans:
I asked what kinds of books she reads, and she
recommended me some too.

name: 甜花
text: そ、そうなんだ……
trans: O-Ohhh okay......

name: 甜花
text:
……甜花も、おすすめ……
してもらうこと……あるよ
trans:
......Tenka has... also been recommended things......
by Naa-chan......

name: 甜花
text:
でも……なーちゃんと、
本のこと、じっくり話すのは……なくて……
trans:
But...... Tenka can't really... talk about books... too
well with her......

name: 甜花
text: ……甜花も、なーちゃんに、聞いてみる……！
trans: ......Tenka will... try asking her......!

name: 千雪
text: ……ええ

name: 甘奈
text:
お待たせ～……！
ふたりとも、ごめんなさい
trans:
Sorry for the holdup～......!
Thanks for waiting.

name: 千雪
text:
ううん、いいのよ
すぐ見つかって良かった
trans:
Oh, don't worry about it.
I'm happy you were able to find it.

name: 甘奈
text:
うん、シューティングゲームのとこに
置きっぱなしにしちゃってたみたいで──
trans:
Yeah, it looks like I just accidentally left it at the
shooting game──

name: 甘奈
text:
その時にね、あのゲームやってる人がいたんだけど、
やっぱり楽しそうで、もっと遊びたくなっちゃった
trans:
When I went back to get it, there were some people
playing, and it looked so fun that I kinda want to give
it another shot.

name: 甘奈
text: ……ね、取材の場所、どこにしよっか？
trans: ...Hey, where do you think we should write about?

name: 甘奈
text: ブックカフェもゲームセンターも、どっちも良かったし……
trans: Both of the places we talked about were so good...

name: 甜花
text: どっちかに……決めるの……む、難しい……
trans: Making... a decision...... is gonna be hard......

name: 千雪
text: ……そうね……
trans: ...You're right...

name: 千雪
text: ……あっ、そうだ！
trans: ...Oh, that's it!

name: 千雪
text:
……ねえ、私たちみんな、『１枠』っていうのは
１か所のことだって決めつけてたけど……
trans:
...We all assumed that one block to write meant we
could only write about one place...

name: 千雪
text: まだ相談する余地はあるんじゃないかしら
trans:
But maybe there's still some room to discuss the
content?

name: 千雪
text:
『話題のニュースポット、ブックカフェVS.
地元で愛されるレトロなゲームセンター』
trans:
"The Hot New Spot in Town:
A book cafe vs. a beloved retro arcade!"

name: 千雪
text:
……って感じでテーマにしちゃえば……
どっちも記事にできるかもしれないなって！
trans:
... If we made that the theme...
Maybe they'd let us write about both!

name: 甘奈
text:
わぁ……！
千雪さんっ、それ名案☆
trans:
Woah...!
That's such a good idea, Chiyuki-san☆

name: 甜花
text:
千雪さん……すごい……
甜花、それがいい……！
trans:
Amazing...... Chiyuki-san......
Tenka... likes that idea......!

name: 千雪
text: ふふっ、じゃあ、プロデューサーさんに相談してみようね
trans:
Fufu, alright, then let's approach Producer-san with
our idea.

name: 甘奈＆甜花
text: うん……！

name: 千雪
text: それに……縁日の方ももうすぐだから、準備しなきゃ♪
trans:
Also... the fair is just around the corner, so
we've got to get ready♪
